name: simd_float3x4
desc: A matrix of three columns and four rows that contains single-precision values.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new matrix.

items.name: init(Float)
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified scalar value on the main diagonal.

items.name: init(diagonal: SIMD3<Float>)
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified vector on the main diagonal.

items.name: init([SIMD4<Float>])
items.desc: Creates a new matrix from an array.

items.name: init(SIMD4<Float>, SIMD4<Float>, SIMD4<Float>)
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified vectors as columns.

items.name: init(columns: (simd_float4, simd_float4, simd_float4))
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified columns.

items.name: init(rows: [SIMD3<Float>])
items.desc: Creates a new matrix with the specified rows.

items.name: var transpose: float4x3
items.desc: The transpose of the matrix.

items.name: var columns: (simd_float4, simd_float4, simd_float4)
items.desc: The columns of the matrix.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A representation of the matrix that is suitable for debugging.

items.name: func simd_matrix(simd_float4, simd_float4, simd_float4) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns a new matrix with the specified columns.

items.name: func simd_matrix_from_rows(simd_float3, simd_float3, simd_float3, simd_float3) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns a new matrix with the specified rows.

items.name: func matrix_from_rows(SIMD3<Float>, SIMD3<Float>, SIMD3<Float>, SIMD3<Float>) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns a new matrix with the specified rows.

items.name: func simd_equal(simd_float3x4, simd_float3x4) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a matrix is exactly equal to the corresponding element in a second matrix.

items.name: func simd_almost_equal_elements(simd_float3x4, simd_float3x4, Float) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a matrix is within a specified tolerance to the corresponding element in a second matrix.

items.name: func simd_almost_equal_elements_relative(simd_float3x4, simd_float3x4, Float) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a matrix is within a specified single-precision relative tolerance to the corresponding element in a second matrix.

items.name: func simd_add(simd_float3x4, simd_float3x4) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns the sum of two matrices.

items.name: func simd_sub(simd_float3x4, simd_float3x4) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns the difference of two matrices.

items.name: func matrix_scale(Float, simd_float3x4) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a scalar value and a matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(Float, simd_float3x4) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a scalar value and a 3 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_float4, simd_float3x4) -> simd_float3
items.desc: Returns the product of a four-element vector and a 3 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_float4, simd_float3x4) -> simd_float3
items.desc: Returns the product of a four-element vector and a 3 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_float3x4, simd_float3) -> simd_float4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 3 x 4 matrix and a three-element vector.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_float3x4, simd_float3) -> simd_float4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 3 x 4 matrix and a three-element vector.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_float2x4, simd_float3x2) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 2 x 4 matrix and a 3 x 2 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_float2x4, simd_float3x2) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 2 x 4 matrix and a 3 x 2 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_float3x4, simd_float3x3) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 3 x 4 matrix and a 3 x 3 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_float3x4, simd_float3x3) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 3 x 4 matrix and a 3 x 3 matrix.

items.name: func simd_mul(simd_float4x4, simd_float3x4) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 4 x 4 matrix and a 3 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func matrix_multiply(simd_float4x4, simd_float3x4) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns the product of a 4 x 4 matrix and a 3 x 4 matrix.

items.name: func simd_linear_combination(Float, simd_float3x4, Float, simd_float3x4) -> simd_float3x4
items.desc: Returns the linear combination of two scalar values and two matrices.

items.name: func simd_transpose(simd_float3x4) -> simd_float4x3
items.desc: Returns the transpose of a matrix.

items.name: subscript(Int) -> SIMD4<Float>
items.desc: Accesses the column at the specified position.

items.name: subscript(Int, Int) -> Float
items.desc: Accesses the element at the specified position.

items.name: typealias float3x4
items.desc: A type alias for a single-precision 3 x 4 matrix.

items.name: typealias matrix_float3x4
items.desc: A type alias for a single-precision 3 x 4 matrix.
